_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The ten powers of a mendicant who has en: Clearly seen with right wisdom all conditions as truly impermanent
Clearly seen with right wisdom that sensual pleasures are truly like a pit of glowing coals
The mind slants, slopes, and inclines to seclusion
Well developed the four kinds of mindfulness meditation
Well developed the four right efforts
Well developed the four bases of psychic power
Well developed the seven awakening factors
Well developed the noble eightfold path
